data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I would like to give another name to my own module Flash::FLAP, as
    the former name is not exactly graceful.

    My module is a clone of AMFPHP, a PHP project to duplicate the AMF
    (Action Message Format) protocol from Macromedia. So the new name
    would be more appropriate.

    When the users transition to the new name, I could kill the old
    Flash:: namespace.
